class MQTTProtocol.MQTTProtocol(client_id: str, broker_url: str, port: int, username: str = None, password: str = None, version: int = None, transport: str = None, qos: int = 0)[source]ÔÉÅ

Bases: IDataSharing

MQTTProtocol class for handling MQTT communication.

async connect(host, port, username, password)[source]ÔÉÅ

Connect to MQTT broker.

Parameters:

  • host ‚Äì MQTT broker host.

  • port ‚Äì MQTT broker port.

  • username ‚Äì MQTT broker username.

  • password ‚Äì MQTT broker password.

async disconnect()[source]ÔÉÅ

Disconnect from MQTT broker.

async publish(topic: str, payload: str | bytes, qos: int = 0, retain=None)[source]ÔÉÅ

Publish a message to an MQTT topic.

Parameters:

  • topic ‚Äì MQTT topic.

  • payload ‚Äì MQTT message payload.

  • qos ‚Äì MQTT Quality of Service level.

  • retain ‚Äì Retain flag for the message.

async subscribe(topic: str, callback)[source]ÔÉÅ

Subscribe to an MQTT topic.

Parameters:

  • topic ‚Äì MQTT topic.

  • callback ‚Äì Callback function to handle incoming messages.

unsubscribe(topic: str)[source]ÔÉÅ

Unsubscribe from an MQTT topic.

Parameters:

topic ‚Äì MQTT topic.

async save_data(topic: str, data: bytes | bytearray | int | float | str | None, callback=None)[source]ÔÉÅ

Save data to an MQTT topic.

Parameters:

  • topic ‚Äì MQTT topic.

  • data ‚Äì Data to be saved.

  • callback ‚Äì Callback function to handle the result.
